issue.title: [C++] Bump lz4 to 1.9.4
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18030](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18030). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently vendor a development version of lz4 to get some required stability fixes.
We should bump to 1.9.4, which was recently released:
https://github.com/lz4/lz4/releases
